name: DS-Templater  - Guide
description:
Guide for DS-Templater - https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1042681939283501853/DS-Templater-(beta)


With this plugin, you can beautifully your design system and make informative style guides in just a couple of minutes. It works with templates that you can customize.


At the moment, the plugin is a beta version in the future it will only get better.
